title: The Worst Games of Our Childhood [The Resties]
description: To follow up on the best games of our childhood, The Resties discuss the worst ones. The funny thing about "bad" games when your kid is that they're often just as formative and memorable as the beloved ones. Join us as we wax poetic on the Sega Activator, bad licensed games, and the infamous SNES Superscope. In the back half of the show, we discuss the best Gameboy that money can buy: the Analogue Pocket.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
